website_summaries.verdict: A basic steamer pot set with sturdy construction from a trusted cookware brand.
pros: This steamer set has a sturdy handle, a see-through tempered glass lid, and a stainless-steel-encapsulated aluminum core for solid heat conduction
It is also dishwasher-safe, induction cooktop compatible, and oven-safe up to 500º F. 3-quart size works well for small families
cons: Some customers have complained about staining, discoloration, or pitting of the stainless steel pot and insert

customer_reviews.title: Works well but ...
customer_reviews.text: This steams really well ( not rocket science) and I like that you can lift out the steamer basket without getting steamed. However ... after a month and several uses, the inside of the saucepan has begun to form rust spots! Not good. I have older Cuisinart stainless steel pans that, even after a decade or more of use, have not done that. I think the quality has taken a dive. Too bad as this use dto be a reliable brand and well priced for the quality..
customer_reviews.author: strong coffe lover

customer_reviews.title: and I'm glad I chose this one
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was going to own only one pot, and I'm glad I chose this one. I mainly steam veggies or chicken with this item, but sometimes I make a soup. It's ideal for my happy and solitary little apartment, but cook a little extra for the infrequent visitor or leftovers. Glass lid is very reassuring so you don't second guess yourself and start to believe that you may have cooked something you did not intend to cook. Very comforting product.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality of the material is very good.
customer_reviews.text: I got this thing to cook tamales. Because of the shape, it kind of collects water at the bottom of the steamer. I had another steamer piece with flat bottom that didn't collect nearly as much water. This means I have to elevate my tamales with another stand so they don't get soggy. Overall quality of the material is very good.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. It's the 2nd one I've purchased as it's the perfect size for my family, and I love the ability to use it as a steamer OR a sauce pot. Thank you Cuisinart
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Terrific capacity, great design, and works wonderfully. You'll ADORE this steamer. Cuisinart is a rock solid company.
customer_reviews.author: Caren S.

customer_reviews.title: This pan is the perfect size for 1 or even 2 people
customer_reviews.text: This pan is the perfect size for 1 or even 2 people. It’s 3 qts. Even after many , many uses, the pan still has a beautiful shine, it still looks brand new! It’s the BEST QUALITY, pan I have ever bought. From now on, I will Only buy Cuisinart pans. This pan is excellent, also, at cooking Vegetables, because of the Steamer included! 👍
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: Defective Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 77-35CG pot, 3 quart steamer with lid, and on the first use, I boiled water for pasta. The inside bottom of the pan started flaking in small spots and it was left with pit marks. Luckily, this was visible due to boiling water.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The best entry pot you can find
customer_reviews.text: I have been cooking for the last 20 years, and I wish I have found this sooner. Definitely one of the best sauce pan I have and 3 qt is just the right size. I have one time slightly burned something in the pot, but clean up was just so easy. I didn't have to scrub at all. Just boil in a bit of vinegar and the stuck pieces came right off. The glass top and the steamer are just bonus to me. For those looking to start cooking but didn't have a ton of space, you should definitely get this one pot in your kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Lycheeice

customer_reviews.title: Out of the Box, Lunch
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a steamer in my entire life - until now. A guest recently asked if I had one and I had to say no, so I went with the Cuisinart name. So far, so good. After a quick rinse, I banged out some broccoli (8 min.) and frozen dumplings (12 min.). Evenly cooked and scalding hot. Round two was today: cubed sweet potatoes and a burger (New Haven, CT-syle). Perfect. The pot and steamer are medium-sized, providing powerful steam heat (contained by the lid). I'd recommend this for households with one to three people, given the size of the pot. Easy clean up. Glad I bought it. Hope to use it a lot...
customer_reviews.author: Cape Cod Phil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks good! I just wish was bigger. The diameter is 8.5"
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I have been struggling with cheap folding steamer baskets for decades. Should have bought this much sooner. And I love Cuisineart, their products are beautifully designed. This set is balanced, easy to use, handle on pan doesn't get hot. The handles on the steamer pan are short so they get hot but not super hot.
customer_reviews.author: Martegy

customer_reviews.title: Sent back after first use
customer_reviews.text: We used it once to steam some veggies. Like other reviews the inside walls developed a white like film that no washing could remove. We contacted cuisinart and they said it should not do that and to return it. We don’t have this problem with any of our other pots or pans.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Quick
customer_reviews.text: Got here quickly. My other one was well worn. This one matches my old set. However, this one is brushed on the inside which is absolutely not a problem, just different than the one from my old set. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: mommy to one

customer_reviews.title: Our new standby
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy pot, steamer and lid are a good fit. Heats up fast on our induction stove top. Works great on the old gas stove when we need to use that, too. Cleans up well, even when you scorch the living hell out of the contents ... not that I've ever done that. Nah. Never.
customer_reviews.author: greenearth_octobersky

customer_reviews.title: Cooking Up Good News
customer_reviews.text: I am surprised how much I use this; the size is perfect. What is great about this set of cookware is that it heats so evenly on the bottom; the sides do not equally heat up. Some people like handles that do not conduct heat, but I prefer the tradeoff because I can slip this in the oven to stay warm while I finish other parts of a meal. The strainer is, also, fantastic - deep enough to get a lot of vegetables done.
customer_reviews.author: QuintessentiallyYours

customer_reviews.title: Built in measurements!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when I opened this saucepan and saw that it has cups and liters marked on the inside. There are 2 cup increments from 2 cups up to 10 cups and the liters are half increments from 0.5L to 2.5L. Other than that it is a high-quality pan and steamer and I am very happy with my purchase and I am EXTREMELY picky. Took me several days to decide on this pan.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Haltmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great pot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent,just what I was looking for.Even though it is pricey,but it is deserved to be .It is very sturdy and well made .Very pleased with the purchase,highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION: Water pools inside steamer
customer_reviews.text: Caution: water pools inside the steamer insert. Seems to be a design flaw. This shouldn't be a problem for vegetables, but it can mess up absorbent foods like dumplings or tamales. I never had this problem with my Farberware steamer. Disappointing, since Cuisinart has always been a good brand for me.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have several different types of steamer baskets (metal, silicone etc) but they all sit too close to the water in my opinion. This sits several inches above the water. I steam vegetables a couple of times a day and its super easy to wash. Cuisinart 77-35CG Chef's Classic Stainless 3-Piece 3-Quart Steamer Set
customer_reviews.author: Sandy S.

customer_reviews.title: Steamer
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter-in-law. She steams veggies all the time and just lived this new steamer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best $40 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pot, I use it 2-3 times a week, steams beautifully, cant rave about it enough.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Barile

customer_reviews.title: overpriced for service it provides
customer_reviews.text: just did not care for this steamer and really did not use it-returned
customer_reviews.author: mystery

customer_reviews.title: aluminum coating on the screws-not a good idea to cook with aluminum
customer_reviews.text: The screws on this pan are covered with aluminum which I never want to cook with. That should have been mentioned in the description. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: crawling downstream

customer_reviews.title: Great pans for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Great pots and pans for the price. Cleans up well
customer_reviews.author: ShoeAddict

customer_reviews.title: Well made, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Use the steamer several time a week, works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Lesleigh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love the glass top. Good for one serving or several.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn J.

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking easier.
customer_reviews.text: Love to put chicken and olives, tomatoes, celery in the bottom and put carrots, potatoes, green beans in the steam basket. Many uses .
customer_reviews.author: ntweetyb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got these for use on a new glass top stove. They cook food, what can I say?
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer that I have got!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, my new favorite in the kitchen. It makes steaming anything very easy! Cooks fast, and very well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CosmosK

customer_reviews.title: They are both very happy with the quality and the way it performs
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for both of my daughters. They are both very happy with the quality and the way it performs.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Clune

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of stainless steel pots and cleaning them. Steaming is quite fast and makes food tastes better.This pot works great.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I burnt my old steamer because I love my new Cuisinart purchase. It's shiny, pretty, sturdy. Not too big, not too small. I don't know what some of the negative reviews were about. It's a great buy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny N.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean .
customer_reviews.text: Great for steaming veggies love the glass lid very durable !!!
customer_reviews.author: Walter Dettman

customer_reviews.title: Good value and durability
customer_reviews.text: Handles get very hot and description didn’t mention this issue.
customer_reviews.author: beautybcr

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: Friend talked me into buying this and it really is useful. It's especially good for reheating rice, Chinese dumplings and other leftovers that the microwave doesn't handle well. Of course it steams veg too at a rate that uses less electricity than a plain pot. This lid fits the pot without the strainer on it as well, giving me an extra saucepan. I would say it's big enough to hold meal size portions. And being stainless it's easy to wash by hand and also fits we'll in the dishwasher. I wish I'd bought this before.
customer_reviews.author: Diane G.

customer_reviews.title: Steamed veggies in minutes
customer_reviews.text: The steamer works great. The only reason I have given it four stars is because after the first use, the inside of the bottom pan became discolored. There is probably a trick to remove this, but if haven't learned what it is yet.
customer_reviews.author: KaJo365

customer_reviews.title: Quality and function
customer_reviews.text: What I really liked is the strainer has handles. This product is quality and you cant beat the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great steaming Pot.
customer_reviews.text: This pot is great for steaming our veg's for the family. Really like this cook ware.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Lid leaks
customer_reviews.text: The lid of this steamer set lets steam escape around the edges.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mac Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The steamer can fit in all the pots i have.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in Every Way!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pans! Perfect addition to my Lodge cast iron skillets!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do the job.Glass lids a little thin compared to my T Fal lids
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Halstead

customer_reviews.title: more like STAIN ONLY
customer_reviews.text: pan gets discolored with barely any use, some type of residue has corroded it, what a POS. F - Cuisinart, POS brand, more like STAIN ONLY STEEEL
customer_reviews.author: Fred Netzband

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if the lid had a small opening for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Would be better if the lid had a small opening for the steam/air to vent.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot. It is easy to use and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Janet H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set- except for the edges are sharp. Be careful when you wash by hand
customer_reviews.author: T Money

customer_reviews.title: Super
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter who has several high end cookware pieces. She loves the size of the pot, it cooks evenly and the glass lid enables visual contact without lifting lid. No disappointment .
customer_reviews.author: Curlylocks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combo
customer_reviews.text: I use these together and seperatley. I love that it is so versitile. I can use the steamer if I want to steam veggies or I can use just the pan for sauces, etc. The lid fits either way. Great set.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Anders

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you want to eat healthy this pan will start you on your way. It is easy to clean and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I have several top end Cuisinart pans and these products look and work as well as my All-Clad ones do. This, however, is not one of their top end products as the aluminum is on the outside on the bottom instead of being sandwiched between stainless as in their better pans. That said I bought this as a steamer and for that it works well and for the price I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: busrey

customer_reviews.title: What I expected to compliment what I bought in store
customer_reviews.text: I picked out Cuisinart because it was the best balance between quality and price. I picked the Steamer Set because I wanted a match with a sauce pan that I bought in a store, but couldn't find the Steamer Set in a store.
customer_reviews.author: handiman1941

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cookware. Worked up to my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cookware. Worked up to my expectations. Excellent addition to my cookware.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to our Green Gourmet pro set which didn't come bundled with a steamer.
customer_reviews.author: Nosaj

customer_reviews.title: Best Pot Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much one of the best pots ever! This is excellent for steaming a bulk of veggies. Perfect when making my zucchini soup or steaming potatoes for oven fries. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Really nice steamer set
customer_reviews.text: This simple does what it needs to do. Seals well and thus steams well. The only downside is the base pan has gradually become discolored with use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sherwood

customer_reviews.title: Best Steamer Ever
customer_reviews.text: I think everyone should have this steamer in their kitchen. It doubles as a great pasta pan! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Germata

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously a life saver! I used to use a different vegetable steamer and it would run out of water easily and burn. This allows for a lot of water to be added and it cooks the vegetables very evenly. It's also easy to clean. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: grenouillefrançaise

customer_reviews.title: Pitted and rusting.
customer_reviews.text: I have had the pan for 3 months. I got stainless steel specifically so I could put it in my dishwasher. I noticed last night the handles on the steamer basket are now pitted and rusting. I have not babies these, but I have not abused them. Very disappointed, I will not but Cuisinart again.
customer_reviews.author: Angi W

customer_reviews.title: Love This Pot!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Cuisinart lives up to its name! I use this pot all the time and absolutely love it! Even if I forget to turn something down on the stove and it ends up scorching on the bottom (which is rare), it's so easy to clean! Just a little hot water, dish soap, soak a little bit, and wow... easy peasy! I just recently purchased an induction countertop cooktop and have also used this same pot to cook on it. Works great! Now, I have several other sizes of Cuisinart pots of this quality and induction-compatible saved in my wish list. Oh yeah... the steamer basket is pretty awesome too...
customer_reviews.author: DragonflyJoy60Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great in every way!
customer_reviews.text: This Cuisinart stainless steel steamer is beautiful and functional. It has a mirror finish that looks good in any kitchen. You can just feel the quality that goes into this steamer. It is very easy to clean and care for. It is dishwasher safe but I hand wash mine. I want it to keep that beautiful finish.
customer_reviews.author: C. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart quality set
customer_reviews.text: Steamed food is very healthy & good! I put some butter, salt & pepper in the water. I usually steam for about 1/2hr BokChoy, onions, beets, celery, potato sweet, & reg. I know there are a lot more things that can be done with this. High quality in Cuisinart always. Nice addition to my Cuisinart pan set. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Owen

customer_reviews.title: Indelible stains/spots in the metal bottom of pot afterfirst use.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the product recommendations (and other purchaser reviews) for cleaning the pot before first use to remove any possible residual polishing materials. But after steaming green beans for the first use, the bottom of the pot showed indelible stains/spots (about 15 t 18) ,as other purchasers have reported. Two other smaller saucepans I ordered at the same time showed no such defects after the same cleaning procedures.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Happy life".
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! She has several other Cuisinart pots and pans, so she knew what to expect with this one. She really likes the glass lid so that she can see how the food is doing without letting the steam out. I would not hesitate to buy more Cuisinart cook ware. "Happy wife........Happy life".
customer_reviews.author: Fast Freddy

customer_reviews.title: High-quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, heavy-duty cookware set. The bottom of the saucepan is very thick so food doesn't stick and it heats evenly. The steamer basket is large and perfect for steaming approx 6-8 servings of vegetables. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer! I use it everyday. It is durable. The only thing is the handle gets too hot to touch. I need to use an oven mitt
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: I loved the efficiency of steaming broccoli while cooking fettuccini on ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for everything from boiling pasta, making potatoes, and creating sauces. I loved the efficiency of steaming broccoli while cooking fettuccini on the same burner. After a year and a half of use i heard some popping on the bottom of my pot and noticed it had begun warping. I emailed Cuisinart and a week after getting no response back i feel that its time to move on. I'm sure I got my moneys worth with the use, but not getting a response after being sold a lifetime warranty product didn't sit well with me. Time to replace it with All Clad.
customer_reviews.author: W3stwing

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming vegetables without overcooking them
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I needed a steamer, and a nice pot with lid. This does it all.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Quality is best!
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of my other steamers because it is just large enough to take care of my needs. It is also really easy to handle when cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon Faber

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small steamer pan for one. Now I can make enough veggies for me that hubby hates!
customer_reviews.author: Interpreter

customer_reviews.title: It cleans up really easy
customer_reviews.text: Best ever, great size, I do allot of steam shrimp and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley E.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Sets of pans seldom come with a steamer anymore. This steamer pan filled that gap.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: I was immediately sent another one when I notified amazon and it is perfect. I love it
customer_reviews.text: First one I received arrived with a large dent. I was immediately sent another one when I notified amazon and it is perfect. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: I love this set
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. It is larger, so steaming food like asparagus is easier. It is also VERY sturdy. When it was in the box, the UPS guy left it in front of my garage door, and I accidently ran over it. It not only survived, but was intact, save for the tiniest of dents. I kept it instead of returning it, because there was really not damage that affected using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette D. Hirtz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pot was fantastic! The pot stems veg's perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ron M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Although it is quite small it still got the job done! We have been using this for a while and it always steams very well!
customer_reviews.author: Pharmercy

customer_reviews.title: ... use this every day to steam vegetables and I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day to steam vegetables and I love it so much. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Hard Water Stains Immediately
customer_reviews.text: Hard water rings collected immediately. I have 40 year old stainless pots of much better quality. I was not expecting this from Cuisinart. However, a little warm water, vinegar and elbow grease cleaned it up.
customer_reviews.author: Vulgar Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Headline for a pan. hmm
customer_reviews.text: Use it everyday. The lid makes a clicking sound, for a while after use. Fine other than that.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: I like the glass lid
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking all over for one this size. I like the glass lid. I wish the quality was as good as my alclad but the price is great. I wish it had the helper handle for carrying. Overall it's nice.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl binnall

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice pot strong and durable and nice to look at
customer_reviews.author: Jim J  Pleasanton CA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 3 QT. steamer and I am very satisfied with the purchase. It is great for steaming vegetables or you can just use the 3 Qt. pan for another purpose. This series of pans has a mirror finish, is light weight, and very easy to clean. A good looking pan and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter and she loves them! They are easy to clean and cook foods evenly. We have the same set for 18 years and they still look new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for steaming veggies!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set -- I purchased it for steaming veggies. It's easy to clean and the parts all fit together well. It cooks evenly and is a beautiful addition to my kitchen cookware. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Neera

customer_reviews.title: Great Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I needed a steamer to go with my Cuisnart pot set, found this one, the basket fits the pot that came with it, my 3 quart pot and my 2 quart pot. So I can use with different pots.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baumann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed with this purchase and product. The first time I used it, it started getting white spots on the bottom of the pot. Also, it rusted. This is suppose to be stainless. I wanted to return this steamer but I'm not willing to pay for shipping so I'm just gonna keep it. But I will not buy anymore kitchen sets on this website. I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addict

customer_reviews.title: Cuisinart Steamer
customer_reviews.text: It's a great steamer but like all stainless steel pots it got spots all over the place, so far only the steamer basket.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: It also looks very pretty on the stove
customer_reviews.text: Wpw. This pan is very special. It also looks very pretty on the stove. Functions like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: It's a beauty!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Chrsitmas gift, so it hasn't been used yet, but it is gorgeous - appears to be verrrrry well made - looking forward to giving this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Babs DeM

product_meta.title: Cuisinart 77-35CG Chef's Classic Stainless 3-Piece 3-Quart Steamer Set
product_meta.description:
BRINGING THE GOOD LIFE HOME
Inspired by the great French kitchens, Cuisinart began making professional cookware over 30 years ago. Constructed of the finest materials available, to perfectly perform all of the classic cooking techniques. Designed to last a lifetime, Cuisinart cookware makes family meals memorable and entertaining a pleasure. Savor the good life right at home, with family and friends. Cuisinart makes it absolutely delicious.

Cuisinart Chef's Classic Stainless is an investment that will prove its worth every time you use it. Exclusively designed aluminum encapsulated base provides superior heat conductivity and even heat distribution to meet the demands of gourmet chefs everywhere. When properly cared for, your Cuisinart Chef's Classic Stainless Cookware will give countless years of service and pleasure. Follow the use and care suggestions in this leaflet to preserve and maintain the cookware's original beauty.

Whether you're a serious gourmet, a regular entertainer, or cooking for the family, this 3-piece steamer set makes it easy to cook healthy whether preparing nutritious steamed vegetables or steaming a pot of mussels. 

What's in the Box A 3-quart saucepan, a stainless steamer insert, and a clear glass lid.

PRODUCT FEATURES
Unsurpassed Heat Distribution
Pure aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly. Eliminates hot spots. 

The Coolest Touch in Home Cooking
Cast stainless steel Cool Grip stick handles are contoured for a secure grip and designed to stay cool on the stovetop. 

Superior Cooking Surface
Stainless steel cooking surface does not discolor, react with food, or alter flavors. 

Perfect Balance
Riveted stainless steel handles, including side grips and helper handles, are professionally riveted to ensure a lifetime of perfect balance. 

Flavor Lock Lid
Tight-fitting stainless steel lids fit tight to lock in flavor, texture and nutrients. Wide, easy grip handles. 

Drip-Free Pouring
Rims of cookware are tapered to make pouring clean and easy. 

Versatile Performance
Oven safe to 500°F. Cook on stovetop, in oven, or under broiler. Freezer safe for easy food storage. 

Dishwasher Safe
Brilliant stainless steel comes out of the dishwasher looking like new.
feature_bullets: Versatile set includes 3-quart sauce pan with steamer insert and tight-fitting lid
Aluminum encapsulated base heats quickly and spreads heat evenly
Stainless steel handles stay cool on the stove-top and are riveted for strength
Oven safe to 500 degrees F; tight-fitting stainless steel lids seal in nutrients
